alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Erie and northern Crawford Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Albion, or 7 miles southeast of Conneaut, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Erie, Corry, Edinboro, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Wattsburg, Canadohta Lake, Lincolnville, Northwest Harborcreek, Wesleyville, Lake City, Conneautville, Cranesville, Springboro, Platea, Mill Village and McKean. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
